channel.title: Virtualbox on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Virtualbox on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Disable date/time sync between VirtualBox client and host
item.description: by msa.operation @ forum.virtualbox.org original post: https://forums.virtualbox.org/viewtopic.php?t=8535 vboxmanage setextradata [VMname] "VBoxInternal/Devices/VMMDev/0/Config/GetHostTimeDisabled" "1" Note: replace [VMname] with the name of target virtual machine; replace “1” with “0” to turn the sync back on.
